IndexPage.description: This is a basic example demonstrating the use of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top-right corner and see how the content changes.
IndexPage.title: Secretimmo

PathnamesPage.description:
Paths are also internationalized.

If you use the default language, English, you will see /en/pathnames in the browser's address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL will be localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
PathnamesPage.title: Paths

Error.description:
Unfortunately, we encountered an error.

You can try reloading the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

NotFoundPage.description: Please check the address in the navigation bar or use the menu to access a known page.
NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found

Form.title: Rental Application Form
Form.desc: (Compliant with GDPR and Luxembourgish data protection and non-discrimination laws.)
Form.second_title: Important Note â€“ Data Protection & Non-discrimination
Form.second_desc_1: The data collected in this form is limited to the strictly necessary elements for the evaluation of your rental application.
Form.second_desc_2: No information related to race, ethnic origin, religion, political views, sexual orientation, health, pregnancy, or marital status will be asked or used.
Form.conformite_legale_2: the *Law of August 1, 2018* on the protection of individuals with regard to data processing
Form.conformite_legale_3: the *Amended Law of November 28, 2006* on equal treatment
Form.step4_title: 4. Household Composition Expected in the Property
Form.rental_guarantee_label: Rental guarantee or unpaid rent insurance available
Form.documents_required_desc: Please attach the following documents for each adult:
Form.document_requirement_2: Any other document confirming financial stability
Form.document_note: Without these documents, the application cannot be processed.
Form.previous_rental_issues_label: Have you ever had payment delays or disputes related to a rental?
Form.step10_title: 10. Consent to the processing of personal data
Form.data_consent_description: I declare that I have read and understood the privacy notice attached to this form.
Form.data_consent_description2: I agree that my data will be used exclusively for the rental selection procedure, in accordance with:
Form.data_consent_rgpd: In accordance with Article 6 (1) a) and b) of the GDPR
Form.data_consent_law_1: The Law of August 1, 2018 on data protection
Form.data_consent_law_2: The Amended Law of November 28, 2006 on equal treatment
Form.data_consent_checkbox_label: I agree that my data will be used exclusively for the rental selection procedure
Form.data_consent_duration: Maximum retention period: 3 months or until the withdrawal of my consent.
Form.data_consent_required_error: You must accept the processing of your personal data
Form.data_consent_title: I can withdraw my consent or request the deletion of my data at any time.
Form.housing_heberge: Hosted by a third party (family, friend, other)
Form.professional_situation_desc: For each adult occupying the property, please provide the following information:
Form.important_information_title: Important Information â€“ Reservation Fee and Exit Condition Report
Form.reservation_commission_description: The tenant acknowledges being informed that to *reserve the property*, a *fee equivalent to 50% of the monthly rent excluding VAT (excl. tax)* is required *before any lease contract is drafted.*
Form.reservation_commission_point1: This amount allows to *reserve the property on a priority basis* and block the availability of the property while preparing the contract.
Form.reservation_commission_point2: In case of a *fundamental contractual disagreement* before signing (clause deemed unacceptable, change in essential conditions), *the commission will be fully refunded* to the candidate.
Form.reservation_commission_point3: However, in case of an *unjustified unilateral withdrawal* after the oral or written acceptance of the offer, the commission may be retained as compensation for the work undertaken.
Form.reservation_commission_note: This fee *is not a guarantee*, but *agency fees for reserving* the property, and it is *separate from the security deposit (caution).*
Form.exit_condition_report_description: The tenant also acknowledges that a *mandatory professional exit condition report* will be carried out at the end of the lease:
Form.exit_condition_report_point1: This service will be charged at *â‚¬250 excluding VAT (i.e., â‚¬267.50 including VAT)*
Form.exit_condition_report_point2: It aims to *protect the tenant's deposit*, by ensuring an impartial, contradictory, and detailed evaluation of the property condition at the time of its return.
Form.rgpd_desc: In accordance with Articles 12 to 21 of the GDPR, you have the following rights:
Form.rgpd_list_1: Right of access to your data
Form.rgpd_list_3: Right to erasure (â€˜right to be forgottenâ€™)
Form.rgpd_list_6: Right to withdraw your consent at any time
Form.rgpd_list_7: Right to file a complaint with the CNPD Luxembourg:
Form.first_name_error: First name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
Form.last_name_error: Last name must be between 2 and 50 characters and contain only letters
Form.submit_success: Your request has been successfully sent.
Form.submit_error: An error occurred while sending the form. Please try again.
Form.min_error: The minimum value must be greater than or equal to
Form.max_error: The maximum value must be less than or equal to
Form.signature_required_error: Please sign the signature of the main applicant.
